text: Welcome! Let’s walk through how you can see new furniture in your home. Have you printed out a marker yet?
The marker is a printed image that you place on the floor to establish the scale of your furniture and anchor it in reality.

carousel.text: Browse the app to find furniture you like and press "View in your home". Place the marker on the floor where you’d like to see the furniture and point your camera at the marker.
Move around to view the product from any angle. If the product is too large, hold your finger on the item and move it away from you on the screen while keeping your device pointed at the marker.
You can rotate products by swiping side to side.  If you click the grid, you can swap out products.  You can even take pictures of new furniture in your home and share them!
That’s it – simple!  If you get confused, click help in the menu to return to these instructions.  Have fun!
